ForgeAppÂ¶

The “ForgeApp” is the TurboGears web application that serves as the HTTP server. Familiarity with TurboGears and WSGI will help when developing and deploying your own ForgeApp. Vulcan offers the ForgeConfig class as an abstract base for your application’s AppConfig.

This is a horizontally scalable service when used with an HTTP load balancer.
